entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 except minus 23 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18 except minus 23 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
